extendedInfo.description: ** Please contact me if you encounter any issues with this app. Please. Because we developers are unable to get ** back to the users directly which is very sad so let me help you if my app gave you a problem. You can still leave a ** negative feedback but still, please let me help. You can email me through this page or through the app. Thanks!Ever considering having a Smart Cover feature for your Android Device? Now you can!!This application allows you to Turn On your screen after removing it from cover. Gentlemen, do you keep your device in your pockets? Check your device status immediately after taking it out without pressing any buttons!!Ladies, do you keep your device in your bag? This application will turn on your screen for you without you having to reach for the buttons!Might you be using a Device Wallet which also acts as a Cover?Additional Features** Turn on your Screen and automatically unlock!!** Turn on/off your screen without using Power or Home buttons.** Perform magic tricks. ^_^** Disable in Landscape mode** Beep option when turning on/off screen (Thanks Brian)** Choice of tone for the above feature (Thanks Novak, Andreas)** Vibrate option when turning on/off screen (Thanks Ignatius)Note:** Due to the sensitivity of the Proximity Sensor, I strongly suggest not to use the function turn off screen by this application. To turn off the feature, just set the duration to -1 seconds.Instead, I suggest that you use another application to lock your screen. Here, I suggest using "Lock Screen Now" which is also developed by me. There are also many other Lock Screen applications which you can find on Google Play.** Do note that this application requires proximity sensor to work.** Requires Device Administrator for the Turn Off screen feature.** To UNINSTALL this application, you have to first remove the Device Administrator rights for this application. When you choose to uninstall this application, it will prompt you to remove the Device Administrator Rights. If not, please go to Settings > Security > Device Administrator > Uncheck this application.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: For some reason, this is the only prox lock that works for my phone. So big thanks to Daniel. Maybe add a few more features in the future?
reviews.author: Anton Kallio

reviews.title: Helpful application
reviews.comment: It\'s of great use together with flip cover for my Nexus 4. Saves me of using button press every time I want to wake up my phone. Battery drain also looks insignificant.
reviews.author: Vinod Kumar Bhambri

reviews.title: Testing for 1 week but I say,its a good app
reviews.comment: Testing for 1 week but I say,its a good app!  it just that when I am using Flip Cover it can\'t sense the cover when I close it but over all it\'s a good app!Keep it up...   5 star for you...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: one problem
reviews.comment: It works BUT when the device wakes  up and shows the lock screen the display brightness is set to zero. After the first screen touch the brightness returns to normal, but in bright sunlight you can\'t see the screen enough to do that.
reviews.author: Richard Tolhurst Smith

reviews.title: HTC wildfire
reviews.comment: Excellent it works well in my phone and it works very well .those how want to search for cover locks download it it is great app.
reviews.author: syed yunus

reviews.title: Works like it says
reviews.comment: I use this app on my HTC One with a flip case to mimic the iPad smart cover.  Now when I open the case it wakes up, and when I close the cover it goes to sleep.  Perfect!
reviews.author: James Adams

reviews.title: Like it
reviews.comment: It needs some improvement and as it stukes time to time
reviews.author: Ziad Qasim

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Best free app..!   Very honest developer,who care more to learn and improve, then to just collect stars. I sent you my comments by e-mail, please work on them, your app is yet the best free flip cover app on the market.
reviews.author: George Shisha

reviews.title: good\357\274\201
reviews.comment: but sometime i open my flip case,(xperia miro)my screen will not respond so i need to close and open it again.sometime only,the probability maybe only 1/10.second is when i set PIN at my screen lock ,after close the cover it will light up for a few second and then lock the screen one more time..,anyway ,well done!keep going=)
reviews.author: daniellai Lai

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Please add option to remove icon from notification bar....perfect app otherwise
reviews.author: Amritanshu Pandey

reviews.title: Great Job
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t find a similar app to do the job on Xperia Z 4.3. This one does it perfectly! Many thanks :)

reviews.title: Best app, still needs improve
reviews.comment: After around 4 mins it will stop working, just inprove on that, the rest is great!

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Most importantly, great communication from the developer!  Daniel, please keep up the good work!

reviews.title: Need Fix..
reviews.comment: it goes dark when the screen turn on...
